Fluid Simulation - Remote Control

Disconnected
Click and drag on this area to control the fluid simulation remotely

Using the Controller

  • Use the canvas area to draw fluid movements by clicking and dragging
  • Click the "Random Splats" button to generate random splats in the simulation
  • Use the pattern buttons to create predefined fluid movements
  • Open the main simulator to see your controls in action
  • Try the beat detector to make the fluid react to music
